DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-masked , control study evaluate safety efficacy fluocinolone acetonide intravitreal implant management subject non-infectious uveitis affect posterior segment eye . An additional objective compare safety efficacy two dose fluocinolone acetonide .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Fluocinolone Acetonide Intravitreal Implant
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant female least 6 year age diagnose treated recurrent , Noninfectious uveitis affect posterior segment one eye least 1 year prior start study , Had clinically 'quiet ' eye surgery . Coexistent medical ocular condition would interfere obtain interpret data study .
